lines.content: This is a chatbot which is build by using Java.
User will required to input their to-dos, deadline or event to their schedule. User can refer to the guidance for the template to be input.
Duke is able to deal with errors such as incorrect inputs entered by the user.
document important assumptions that should hold at various points in the code.
Refactor the code to extract out closely related code as classes.
description		: return error message as there is no to-do task in the input.
expected outcome	: ☹ OOPS!!! The description of a todo cannot be empty.
description		: to input task (borrow book) without any date/time attached to it.
expected outcome	: Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 5 tasks in the list.
description		: display out all the existing task that already input to the user when requested.
expected outcome	: Here are the tasks in your list:
description		: return error message as there is no date or time details after deadline description.
expected outcome	: ☹ OOPS!!! The description of a todo cannot be empty.
description		: return error message as there is no date or time details after deadline description.
expected outcome	: Invalid input, the details is missing.
description		: to input task (return book) that need to be done before Sunday.
expected outcome	: Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 2 tasks in the list.
description		: to input task (do homework) that need to be done before no idea :-p.
expected outcome	: Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 3 tasks in the list.
description		: to input task (submit homework) that need to be done before 13 November 2021, 11pm.
expected outcome	: Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 4 tasks in the list.
description		: return error message as there is no date or time details after event description.
expected outcome	: ☹ OOPS!!! The description of an event cannot be empty.
description		: return error message as there is no date or time details after event description.
expected outcome	: Invalid input, the details is missing.
description		: to input task (event meeting) that start at 2pm and ends at 3pm.
expected outcome	: Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 5 tasks in the list.
description		: mark task no.1 as done.
expected outcome	: Nice! I've marked this task as done:
description		: delete the task no. 1 from the schedule.
expected outcome	: Noted. I've removed this task:
expected outcome	: Bye. Hope to see you again soon!
Ui: deals with interactions with the user
Storage: deals with loading tasks from the file and saving tasks in the file
Parser: deals with making sense of the user command
TaskList: contains the task list e.g., it has operations to add/delete tasks in the list
public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
System.out.println(Ui.line + "☹ OOPS!!! The description of a todo cannot be empty.\n" + Ui.line);
System.out.println(Ui.line + "☹ OOPS!!! The description of a deadline cannot be empty.\n" + Ui.line);
System.out.println(Ui.line + "\nInvalid input, the details is missing.\n" + Ui.line);
Deadline newDeadline = new Deadline(parts[0].trim(), taskDate, taskTime);
System.out.println(Ui.line + "☹ OOPS!!! The description of an event cannot be empty.\n" + Ui.line);
System.out.println(Ui.line + "\nInvalid input, the details is missing.\n" + Ui.line);
Event newEvent = new Event(parts[0].trim(), taskDate, taskTime);
System.out.println( "☹ OOPS!!! I'm sorry, but I don't know what that means :-(");
* A DeadLineTask object stores a task with deadline.
public Deadline(String newTask, LocalDate newDate, LocalTime newTime) {
public Event(String newTask, LocalDate newDate, LocalTime newTime) {
System.out.println(line + "\nGot it. I've added this task:\n"
* Remove the specific task from the schedule.
+ "\nNow you have " + taskCount + " tasks in the list.");
/** Print all the tasks that already input.*/
System.out.println(line + "\nHere are the tasks in your list:");
* Mark the specific task as completed in the schedule.
* @param input task to be marked as done.
System.out.println(line + "Nice! I've marked this task as done:\n  "
System.out.println("Now you have " + taskCount + " tasks in the list.");
* Find the specific task based on keyword input by user.
System.out.println("Here are the matching tasks in your list!");
System.out.println(line + "Sorry, you don't have any task in your list!");
String end = "What can I do for you?\n";
String guide = "Note: Type 'guide' for more information.\n";
System.out.println("To add a new to do job:             todo {description}");
System.out.println("To add a new deadline:              deadline {description} /by {yyyy-MM-dd HHmm}");
System.out.println("To add a new event:                 event {description} /at {yyyy-MM-dd HHmm}");
System.out.println("To mark a task as completed:        done {taskSequence (in number)}");
System.out.println("To delete a task:                   delete {taskSequence (in number)}");
System.out.println("To search task by keyword:          find {keyword}");
System.out.println("To exit the chat bot:               bye");
System.out.println(line + "Bye. Hope to see you again!");
